name: forwarded-for
description: Abstraction for retrieving ip address information from a Node.js connection. Searches for proxy headers before degrading req.address

scripts.coverage: istanbul cover node_modules/.bin/_mocha -- --reporter spec --ui bdd test.js
scripts.test-travis: istanbul cover node_modules/.bin/_mocha --report lcovonly -- --reporter spec --ui bdd test.js

author: Arnout Kazemier
